sentences.en: A good general diet should include plenty of fresh vegetables.
sentences.cn: 良好的日常饮食应该包含大量的新鲜蔬菜。

sentences.en: His job includes looking after under-21 teams.
sentences.cn: 他的职责包括照管21岁以下球队。

sentences.en: Other amenities, less commonly available, include a library and exercise room.
sentences.cn: 还有一些不太常有的设施，包括图书馆和健身房。

sentences.en: Other changes include more tolerant attitudes to unmarried couples having children.
sentences.cn: 其他变化包括对非婚夫妇生育更为宽容的态度。

sentences.en: Other charges include fraud and illegal appropriation of land.
sentences.cn: 其他指控包括欺诈罪和非法侵占土地罪。

sentences.en: Symptoms of anaemia include weakness, fatigue and iron deficiency.
sentences.cn: 贫血的症状包括虚弱、疲劳和缺铁。

sentences.en: Symptoms of the disease include fever and weight loss.
sentences.cn: 这种疾病的症状包括发烧和体重减轻。

sentences.en: That programme will include live commentary on the England-Ireland game.
sentences.cn: 那个节目将包括英格兰与爱尔兰比赛的实况报道。

sentences.en: The curriculum includes courses in computing.
sentences.cn: 课程内容包括计算机技术。

sentences.en: The new e-books will include a host of Rough Guide titles.
sentences.cn: 新电子书将包括大量的简明指南。

sentences.en: The new road schemes include a link between Chelmsford and the M25.
sentences.cn: 新的道路规划中包括了一条切姆斯福德与M25号高速公路的连接线。

sentences.en: The performance will include the premiere of three new ballets.
sentences.cn: 三段新编芭蕾舞将在演出中首演。

sentences.en: The radio station has to include a substantial proportion of classical music.
sentences.cn: 该电台不得不播放大量的古典音乐。

sentences.en: The symptoms include skin rashes, fever, and painful joints.
sentences.cn: 病症包括皮疹、发烧和关节疼痛。

sentences.en: The tour will include games against the Australian Barbarians.
sentences.cn: 这次巡回赛将包括和澳大利亚野人队的比赛。

sentences.en: The unemployed executives include former sales managers, directors and accountants.
sentences.cn: 被解雇的管理人员包括前销售经理、主管和会计。

sentences.en: This month's offers include a shirt, trousers and bed covers.
sentences.cn: 本月的特价商品包括一款衬衫、裤子和多种床罩。

words.tran_cn: 包括（include的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_en: if one thing includes another, the second thing is part of the first

trans.tran_cn: 包含， 包括； 把…计算在内
trans.tran_en: if one thing includes another, the second thing is part of the first
